title: Baby Daddy Protector
description: All I need is a baby. And a husband. It’s not that I really want either, to be honest. But to save my country from my jerk of a cousin, I’m willing to make that sacrifice.I love my country, but it has a silly law that the only way a woman can rule is if she’s the mother of a male heir to the throne. Otherwise, my horrible cousin is next in line, and I just can’t let him take over when my ailing father dies. No way.Now, I just need to find someone who’s just as desperate as I am. And my eyes fall on him. Zachary Raybourn. Hot. Sexy. Silent. The bane of my existence. He’s a Navy SEAL who has the task of protecting me while we’re in the U.S.I’m a grown woman. I don’t need a babysitter. I need a husband. And Zachary needs to get back to his unit. So, I offer him a deal. It’s an early Christmas present to each other. Marry me, get me pregnant, and he’s free.I just hope that when the time comes, I’ll be glad to see him go. Re-released in 2023! Originally published as The SEAL's Contract Baby.
author: Katie Knight
